unnormalised: State budgets in India reflect priorities, like infrastructure projects in Maharashtra needing Rs. 5000 crore for Mumbai-Pune expressway upgrades. Allocations for healthcare, especially post-COVID, are crucial, similar to messaging in "Swades," emphasizing rural development. Transparent budgeting at institutions like IIM Ahmedabad aids good governance. Fiscal discipline ensures effective implementation.
normalised: State budgets in India reflect priorities, like infrastructure projects in Maharashtra needing rupee five thousand crore for Mumbai-Pune expressway upgrades. Allocations for healthcare, especially post-COVID, are crucial, similar to messaging in "Swades," emphasizing rural development. Transparent budgeting at institutions like I I M Ahmedabad aids good governance. Fiscal discipline ensures effective implementation.
